msContents.summary: A Karaim translation of the Torah and the Haftarah

ab.title: Numbers 26
ab.l: And it was after the plague,and the Lord spoke to Moses and to Eleazar,son of Aaron, the priest, saying,
‘Takethe sum of all the congregation of the children of Israel,from twenty years old and upward, by the house of their fathers, everyone going out to the armyin Israel.’
And Moses and Eleazar,the priest, spoke with them in the steppes of Moab by Jordanof Jericho, saying,
‘From twenty years old and upward,’as the Lord commanded Moses and the childrenof Israel, who went out from the land of Egypt.
Reuben, the firstborn of Israel; the children of Reuben: Of Hanoch:his family — the Hanochites. Of Pallu: his family — the Palluites.
Of Hezron: his family — the Hezronites. Of Carmi: his family — the Carmites.
These are the families of the tribe of Reubenites, andthey that were numbered of them: forty-three thousand and seven hundred andthirty.
And the son of Pallu: Eliab.

Andthe sons of Eliab: Nemuel, and Dathan, and Abiram. These are the Dathanand Abiram, the representatives of the congregation, who quarrelledwith Moses and with Aaron in the congregation of Korah,when they quarrelled before the Lord,
Andthe earth opened its mouth, and swallowed them up,and consumed Korah, when that congregation died,when the fire consumed two hundred-fifty men: and they becamea sign.
But the children of Korah died not.
The sons of Simeon by their families: Of Nemuel:his family — the Nemuelites. Of Jamin: his family — the Jaminites. Of Jachin:his family — the Jachinites.
Of Zerah: his family — theZerahites. Of Shaul: his family — the Shaulites.
These arethe families of the Simeon: twenty-two thousand and twohundred.
The children of Gad by their families: Of Zephon:his family — the Zephonites. Of Haggi: his family — the Haggites. Of Shuni:his family — the Shunites.
Of Ozni: his family — the Oznites.Of Eri: his family — the Erites.
Of Arod: his family —the Arodites. Of Areli: his family — the Arelites.
Theseare the families of the children of Gad by those that were numbered of them: fortythousand and five hundred.
The sons of Judah: Er andOnan. And Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.
And the sons of Judah by their families were:Of Shelah: his family — the Shelanites. Of Perez: his family — the Perezites. Of Zerah:his family — the Zerahites.
And the sons of Perez were:Of Hezron: his family — the Hezronites. Of Hamul: his family — theHamulites.
These are the families of Judah by those that were numbered:seventy-six thousand and five hundred.
The sonsof Issachar by their families: Of Tola: his family — the Tolaites. Of Puvah:his family — the Punites.
Of Jashub: his family — the Jashubites. Of Shimron:his family — the Shimronites.
These are the familiesof Issachar by those that were numbered: sixty-four thousand and threehundred.
The sons of Zebulun by their families: Of Sered: his family — theSeredites. Of Elon: his family — the Elonites. Of Jahleel: his family — theJahleelites.
These are the families of the tribe of Zebulunby those that were numbered: sixty thousand and five hundred.
The sons of Joseph by their families: Manasseh and Ephraim.
The sons of Manasseh: Of Machir: his family — the Machirites. And Machirbegat Gilead. Of Gilead: his family — the Gileadites.
These are the sons of Gilead: Of Iezer: his family —the Iezerites. Of Helek: his family — the Helekites.
Andof Asriel: his family — the Asrielites. And of Shechem: his family — theShechemites.
And of Shemida: his family — the Shemidaites.And of Hepher: his family — the Hepherites.
And Zelophehad,son of Hepher, had no sons, but only daughters.And the names of the daughters of Zelophehad: Mahlah, and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah,and Tirzah.
These are the families of Manasseh, andthose that were numbered of them: fifty-two thousand and seven hundred.
These are the sons of Ephraim by their families: Of Shuthelah:his family — the Shuthelahites. Of Becher: his family — the Becherites. Of Tahan:his family — the Tahanites.
And these are the sonsof Shuthelah: Of Eran: his family — the Eranites.
These arethe families of the sons of Ephraim by those that were numbered: thirty--two thousand and five hundred. These are the sons of Joseph by their families.
The sons of Benjamin by their families: Of Bela:his family — the Belaites. Of Ashbel: his family — the Ashbelites. Of Ahiram:his family — the Ahiramites.
Of Shephupham:his family — the Shuphamites. Of Hupham: his family — the Huphamites.
Andthe sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman: of Ard: his family —the Ardites. Of Naaman: his family — the Naamites.
These arethe sons of Benjamin by their families, and they that were numbered of them:forty-five thousand and six hundred.
These are the sonsof Dan by their families: Of Shuham: his family — the Shuhamites. Theseare the families of Dan by their families.
All the familiesof the Shuhamites, by those that were numbered: sixty-four thousand andfour hundred.
The children of Asher by their families: Of Imna:his family — the Imnites. Of Ishvi: his family — the Ishvites. Of Beriah:his family — the Beriites.
Of the sons of Beriah: of Heber:his family — the Heberites. Of Malchiel: his family — the Malchielites.
And the name of the daughter of Asher: Serah.
These arethe families of the sons of Asher by those that were numbered: fifty-three thousand andfour hundred.
The sons of Naphtali by their families: Of Jahzeel:his family — the Jahzeelites. Of Guni: his family — the Gunites.
Of Jezer: his family — the Jezerites. Of Shillem: his family — the Shillemites.
These are the families of Naphtali by their families, andthey that were numbered of them: forty-five thousand and four hundred.
These were the numbered of the children of Israel, six times a hundredthousand and also a thousand seven hundred and thirty.
Andthe Lord spoke to Moses, saying,
‘The land shall be distributed to these as a portion with the number of names.
To many you shall give more portions, and to few less portions shall be given.To each man his portion shall be given according to those that were numbered.
Just: the land shall be divided by lot.By the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.
The portions of it shall be distributed according to the lot,between many and few.’
And these are they that were numberedof the Levites by their families: Of Gershon: his family — theGershonites. Of Kohath: his family — the Kohathites. Of Merari: his family — the Merarites.
These are the families of the Levites: his family — the Libnites,his family — the Hebronites, his family — the Mahlites, his family — the Mushites, his family — theKorathites. And Kohath begat Amram.
Andthe name of Amram’s wife was Jochebed, daughter of Levi, whom |her mother| bore to Leviin Egypt. And she bore to Amram Aaron andMoses and Miriam, their sister.
And to Aaron was born Nadab, and Abihu,Eleazar, and Ithamar.
AndNadab and Abihu died when they brought forward strange fire before the Lord.

And those that were numbered of them were twenty--three thousand, all males from a month old and upward, because they were not numberedamong the children of Israel, because there was no portion giventhem among the children of Israel.
These are they that were numbered by Moses and Eleazar,the priest, who numbered the children of Israel in the steppesof Moab by the Jordan of Jericho.
And among these there was nota man of them whom Moses and Aaron, the priest, numbered,when they numbered the children of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.
For the Lord had said of them, ‘They will surely die in the wilderness.’And there was not a man was left of them, except Caleb, son of Jephunneh, andJoshua, son of Nun.
